name: Jason Meeder
text: These guys are amazing! Professional and so courteous. Needing some pallets for my daughter's birthday and they took care if everything! Thank you so much !

name: Kevin Lee
text: The best pallets people in this world!

name: Tara Brown
text: Very friendly and hardworking employees! The owner is always professional, honest, and upfront with his customers. They consistently ensure that deliveries are made on time and correct. I would definitely recommend them to anyone!

name: Kristy Clark (Robinson)
text: His "business" is done right in the middle of our neighborhood and me and my other neighbors tires are flattened at least 4 to 5 times a year by pallet nails, which are all in the road, in which the owner Chris Humphries refuses to pay for a replacement tire, even a used one! PLZ DONT GET THIS PALLET SHOP CONFUSED WITH THE ONE RUN BY MICHEAL HUMPHRIES WHO IS A GREAT GUY AND GREAT BUSINESSMAN WHO DOES QUALITY WORK AT GREAT PRICES, VERY FRIENDLY STAFF ALSO.

name: Shelby Anne
text: Good hard workers and busy workers

name: Rachel Marie
text: I think it is a wonderful business and they was very helpful

name: Michael Humphries
text: Its a great place to work and everyone is friendly

name: Jennifer Edwards
text: Dirty

name: David R
text: Great ppl.. Reasonable prices and extremely nice.

name: Alex Kh
text: Fast loading time! Nice and friendly people!

name: Juan Alvarez
text: Friendly people good materials honest been in business forever wow my kind of place

name: Adam garrison
text: So cheap, and good lumber! Good people

name: Pamela Hampton jones
text: Very nice people.. And the $r great

name: Ronnie Taylor
text: Great Place to buy Lumber see Stan 2atdon Sr.or Jr

name: Bruce Spain
text: Loved looking for a new home there.

name: Rodney Hopkins
text: Good folks

name: Leona Neill
text: nice service.

resp.text: We have no idea as to what company you work for so we don't have any idea on why you gave us a 2 star rating.

name: Terry Teague
text: Great

name: Pauly Richards
text: Drivers. Heads up... It's easier to back in from the street. I'm in & out of here regularly with short wait times (or pre loaded trailers). Can't vouch for the load times on brokered freight.

name: Bobby Walker
text: This was my 1st time here. Driver's definitely need to back in from the road.  They had me back into a dock, then moved me out to load a XPO box truck, then loaded me. It took 2hr 34 mins total to load. Picked up 10 pallets.

name: Jennifer Clayton
text: BEWARE, toxic work environment.

name: Jennifer Henson
text: Sitting all day to load a few pallets. Ran me out of time with no where to park.

name: PsychoTrucker
text: 6 hours to load 5 pallets.

name: Joseph Bieker
text: I have worked here for going on 6 years now . I love my job . I am a lead man/supervisor over the mill . Great place to work for . If you do your job then they will do their best Not to lose you. People in office really care about the workers . They offer competitive pay , 401k , paid vacation , life insurance , medical , dental and vision . Just stop by and put a application in .

name: Isaac Prichard
text: Easy to find and really fast at unloading

name: Steve Semar
text: Truck driver here.  Delivering wood from up north to this place.. pull in .  No signs.  Where I parked I was automatically berated by some short guy...napoleon complex. Here we go.  I drive 600 miles a day to keep this show running and this guy treats me like some homeless street boy.    Dont buy anything from this place.  Not American friendly.   The only person I have met from Alabama was this guy.  Yall know how to breed idiots down here.

name: Jason Orr
text: Need an appointment at this place to unload dont know there hours yet

name: Alex Kh
text: No overnight Parking!!! 4 stars because No overnight parking! Thanks forklifts guys who helped me with unload! Maybe need an appointment for unload!
